sources.title: Captain Scarface (1953)
sources.description: A group of communist spies plan to blow up an essential commercial artery, the Panama Canal. To this end, they have kidnapped a nuclear scientist and are traveling by steamship to the coast of South America. Luckily for western civilization, the hard-nosed ship's captain, played by Barton MacLane, has other ideas. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/captain-scarface-1953/

sources.title: Captain Scarface
sources.description: From IMDB : A man desperate to leave South America books passage on a freighter, and learns that the captain has made plans to force a scientist to participate in a mission of destruction.

sources.title: Captain Scarface (1953) BARTON MacLANE
sources.description:
Stars: Barton MacLane, Virginia Grey and Leif Erickson
Director: Paul Guilfoyle

A man desperate to leave South America books passage on a freighter, and learns that the captain has made plans to force a scientist to participate in a mission of destruction!

sources.title: Captain Scarface (1953) Action, Drama, Romance
sources.description:
His Soul Was As Crooked As His Scar. 
A man desperate to leave South America books passage on a freighter, and learns that the captain has made plans to force a scientist to participate in a mission of destruction.

Director: Paul Guilfoyle
Writer: Charles Lang 
Stars: Barton MacLane, Virginia Grey, Leif Erickson 
Genres: Action, Drama, Romance, Thriller

metadata.Plot: The Banos has exploded and sunk at sea, but another freighter, also called the Banos, is now loading at a South American port, under the command of a man known as 'Captain Scarface'. On shore at the Los Rios Hotel, a number of passengers are waiting to board the ship. Sam Wilton is in trouble, and needs to get back to the USA quickly. Ilse Yeager is waiting to be reunited with her father, who arrives with Mr. Kroll, an associate of Captain Scarface. A man named Clegg, who has just completed some work for the captain, also arrives and demands money from Kroll. Meanwhile, the captain is expecting Dr. Yeager, whom he plans to force into helping him on a mission of destruction.
metadata.Actors: Barton MacLane, Virginia Grey, Leif Erickson
